# cortexcloud_group (Data Source)

Provides visibility into a specific user group on the Cortex Cloud platform.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the user group.

### Read-Only

- `creation_time` (Number) The creation time of the group.
- `description` (String) The description of the user group.
- `is_default` (Boolean) Indicates if the group is a default group.
- `last_modified` (Number) The last modified time of the group.
- `user_count` (Number) The number of users in the group.
